course_info.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
course_info.description: Introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and practical applications.

topics.name: Supervised Learning
topics.description: Learning from labeled data for classification and regression tasks

weeks.title: Introduction to Machine Learning

weeks.title: Supervised Learning Algorithms
weeks.description: Linear regression, logistic regression, and decision trees

weeks.title: Model Evaluation
weeks.description: Metrics, validation techniques, and overfitting prevention

lectures.title: What is Machine Learning?
lectures.transcript: Machine learning is a field of computer science that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed...

lectures.title: Linear Regression
lectures.transcript: Linear regression is a basic predictive analytics technique where we model the relationship between variables...
